medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: The classical Chinese set of "Eight Views of the Xiaoxiang Rivers" is paired with the Yoshiwara pleasure quarter in this series. The cartouche in the upper right relates to the motif of Night Rain by showing people with umbrellas walking through a street in the Yoshiwara. A courtesan has prepared the bed for a regular customer.
title: Night Rain with a Regular Customer
